page.title: 16POLICE HEADQUARTERS
page.content: It is in Burntstump park.It is a good area for the {Headquarters}because it is peaceful and they dont get much interference from the traffic etc.Its near the main road and easy to get to from all over the county.The{police} {Headquarters}is open{24}hours a day and there is always someone in the building to supervise telephone calls etc.About{30 to 40 police}work at night.All the jobs are avalible to men and women.They choose there job and train for it.There are about{547 {police officers}and {591}civillian staff.There are more men than women on the police staff,and more women than men on the civillian staff.The transport that they use is horses and cars.They have {27}dogs which are trained by one handler.
